gov.noaa.pmel.tmap.ferret.server.dodstype
Class FerretGrid

java.lang.Object
  dods.dap.BaseType

              dods.dap.Server.SDGrid
                  gov.noaa.pmel.tmap.ferret.server.dodstype.FerretGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
dods.dap.ClientIO, java.lang.Cloneable, dods.dap.Server.RelOps, dods.dap.Server.ServerArrayMethods, dods.dap.Server.ServerMethods
public class FerretGrid
extends dods.dap.Server.SDGrid

Represents a server-side Grid object for the Ferret-DODS server. All datatypes that appear in DDS'es for datasets must have server-side implementations, even if its just a shell.

Modified from org.iges.grads.server.dap.GradsGrid

Read a value from the named dataset for this variable.

Parameters:

public java.util.Vector getDimensions()
